questions.question: How many 'Lord of the Rings' movie-parts exist?
questions.description: The Fellowship of the Ring, The Two Towers, The Return of the King

questions.question: What is the central plot element in 'The Lord of the Rings'?
What is the name of the fictional world in which characters live?
questions.description: Middle-earth is the name of the fictional world

questions.question: 'The Lord of the Rings' is an novel written by:
What is the main theme of 'The Lord of the Rings'?
Who do the hobbits encounter at the Prancing Pony?
What is the name of the elf in the fellowship?
questions.description: Legolas is the name of the elf in the fellowship

questions.question: What is the name of the dwarf in the fellowship?
questions.description: Gimli is the name of the dwarf in the fellowship

questions.question: Who has been following Sam and Frodo?
questions.description: Gollum has been following Sam and Frodo
